column2: Trying to Fall Asleep to FIlms I’ve Managed to Avoid Thus Far in Life Despite Every Motherfucker Alive…
column5: …Incessantly Insisting that I Just HAVE to See Them Generation X, I really fucking hate you… It’s probably a phase that’ll pass when you no longer have economic and cultural dominance, but your movies just… aren’t as great as you continue to insist they were. I would never bother to actually document a rant this way were it not for the amount of people my age and younger who won’t stop fucking telling me to watch their parents’ movies.  Just kill me, okay?
